page.title: 19THE HAMLET OF TUNLEY.
page.content: Tunley is a very small hamlet and has only{eight houses.}All of which are over 200 years old.There are{no {shops,telephone boxes or bus services and only narrow lanes. Tunley is very quiet but that is why people like living there and they all travel 4 miles to the nearest shop and 7 miles to a supermarket. All the inhabitants have{telephones and at least one{car,}but while a telephone is considered vital everyone believes they could be happy without a car. They all enjoy{the beautiful scenery and the wide variety of{wildlife}and of course the{peace}and{quiet.}The disadvantages are the distances to schools and the noise of aircraft from the USAF at Fairford and car horns in the lane.
